name: berkelium
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(symbol Bk) a chemical element that is a soft, silver-white metal, and is radioactive: Berkelium is a very expensive and rare element.
More examplesFewer examples He realized that berkelium could be extracted at the same time.The element was manufactured in a particle accelerator by smashing together isotopes of calcium and a radioactive element called berkelium.
